languages.text: "Я был{mf||а} бы рад{mf||а} положиться на моего сенешаля и не занимать голову такими делами, но ситуация вышла из-под твоего контроля, Абеляр".
"I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Я был{mf||а} бы рад{mf||а} положиться на моего сенешаля и не занимать голову такими делами, но ситуация вышла из-под твоего контроля, Абеляр".

traits.locale_text: "I would be only too happy to trust in my seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiraled out of your control, Abelard."
"I would be only too happy to trust in my seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiraled out of your control, Abelard."
"I would be only too happy to trust in my seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiraled out of your control, Abelard."
"I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

languages.text: “我非常愿意相信我的总领，我也不想把这些破事装到我自己的脑子里。不过，当时的情况已经超出了你的控制，阿贝拉德。”
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: “我非常愿意相信我的总领，我也不想把这些破事装到我自己的脑子里。不过，当时的情况已经超出了你的控制，阿贝拉德。”

languages.text: «Me encantaría poder confiar en mi Senescal en lugar de preocuparme por estos asuntos, pero la situación se le ha descontrolado por completo, Abelard».
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: «Me encantaría poder confiar en mi Senescal en lugar de preocuparme por estos asuntos, pero la situación se le ha descontrolado por completo, Abelard».

languages.text: 「私とて家令長を信頼しており、そのような事態に頭を回したくはない。だが、状況はお前の手に余る事態になっているのだ、アベラルド」
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: 「私とて家令長を信頼しており、そのような事態に頭を回したくはない。だが、状況はお前の手に余る事態になっているのだ、アベラルド」

languages.text: "Ich wäre gerne bereit, auf meinen Truchsess zu vertrauen und meinen Kopf nicht mit solchen Angelegenheiten zu füllen, doch Ihr hattet die Lage nicht mehr unter Kontrolle, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wäre gerne bereit, auf meinen Truchsess zu vertrauen und meinen Kopf nicht mit solchen Angelegenheiten zu füllen, doch Ihr hattet die Lage nicht mehr unter Kontrolle, Abelard."

languages.text: « Je ne demande qu'à déléguer ce genre de problèmes à mon sénéchal, mais force est de constater que vous aviez perdu le contrôle de la situation, Abélard. »
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne demande qu'à déléguer ce genre de problèmes à mon sénéchal, mais force est de constater que vous aviez perdu le contrôle de la situation, Abélard. »

languages.text: "Seneşalime güvenip bu meselelerle aklımı yormamayı yeğlesem de durum, kontrolünden çıktı Abelard."
languages.original_text: "I would be only too willing to trust in my Seneschal and not fill my head with such matters, but the situation had spiralled out of your control, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Seneşal'ime güvenip bu meselelerle aklımı yormamayı yeğlesem de durum, kontrolünden çıktı Abelard."
